titleStmt.title: A postil or orderly disposing of certeine epistles vsually red in the Church of God, vppon the Sundayes and holydayes throughout the whole yeere. Written in Latin by Dauid Chytræus, and translated intoo English by Arthur Golding. Seen and allowed according too the order appoynted
titleStmt.author: Chytraeus, David, 1531-1600.
Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Bynneman. for Lucas Harrison and George Bishop,

notesStmt.note: N7.8 is a cancel bifolium, the first leaf of which may be signed N.vi or N.vii.
